title: iPad mini 6 returns to low of $50 off in Tuesday’s best deals, plus Logitech Crayon and more
content:
All of today’s best deals are headlined by an iPad mini 6 Amazon low at $50 off. Plus, a rare chance to save on the Logitech Crayon for iPad at $58 and this Philips Hue HomeKit lightstrip starter set at $92. Hit the jump for all that and more in the latest 9to5Toys Lunch Break.

more…

The post iPad mini 6 returns to low of $50 off in Tuesday’s best deals, plus Logitech Crayon and more appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Logitech Crayon is now on sale at Amazon and compatible with a wide range of Apple devices including the iPad mini 6, which is $50 off.
